messages.message: How often do we currently update the index for AI Hub Search? Like when I upload something new now - when would that be available to be found through AI Hub Search?

@Rakesh Is refresh enabled in prod?

Also @Jasper pls note we did not directly consume the "Companies" directory, instead a subset of the latest docs from that drive is picked into another isolated drive and indexed, so any changes to the main drive doesn't reflect in this one. Why did we do this? Companies drive has a larger volume of data than what we can support in Search today but this is work in progress, in Q3 we are scaling to a much larger corpus size and our plan is to use the entire Companies directory..
@Hari we dont have refresh enabled yet in Prod and for "Companies" directory since we serve it from a different drive, so any refresh in "Companies" drive also wont show up in search.
